name: Beethoven's 2nd: The Quest for Pups
overview: Unreleased game developed by Designer Software originally meant to be published by Hi-Tech Expressions sometime in either 1993 or in the Fall of 1994. The game was featured at Winter CES 1993 and was featured in some magazines throughout 1994 but was cancelled soon after for unknown reasons. This is an early prototype with no music, only sound effects.
